name: DXF to Image
tagline: Convert DXF to PNG, JPG, or SVG for sharing (e.g. Telegram) or editing.
description: Convert DXF (CAD) files to PNG, JPG, or SVG. Useful when you have DXF from map-grabber, Rhino, or other CAD tools: raster for chat/documents, SVG for vector editing. Uses ezdxf (Matplotlib backend for raster, SVGBackend for vector).
